# website/src/layouts

Provides Astro layout components defining the root HTML structure and theming system for the RunCmd website.

## Contents

[BaseLayout.astro](./BaseLayout.astro) â€” Root layout with dark/light theme persistence via localStorage and `prefers-color-scheme` fallback. Injects global styles, sets meta tags, favicon, and body classes for light/dark modes.

## Behavioral Contracts

Theme persistence uses localStorage key `theme` storing `"dark"` or `"light"`. Fallback to `prefers-color-scheme: dark` media query, defaults to `true` (dark mode). Toggle button uses `data-theme-toggle` attribute with `aria-pressed` state. Body classes: `min-h-screen bg-white dark:bg-gray-950 text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 antialiased`.
